about_the_game:
6. of December is the Independence Day of Finland. Celebrate this greit day by playing this greit game!

Warning: This DLC works only during 6th of December, and during that day the game is in HARD mode, as it is set back in days when men were REAL MEN and life was TOUGH!

content_descriptors.notes:
-Alcohol misuse. Game does not encourage to it though.
-Some violence, including shooting with firearms and some self-harm.
-no murder or torture etc.

detailed_description:
6. of December is the Independence Day of Finland. Celebrate this greit day by playing this greit game!

Warning: This DLC works only during 6th of December, and during that day the game is in HARD mode, as it is set back in days when men were REAL MEN and life was TOUGH!
name: The Real Man Summer Championship 2019 - KIITOS SUOMI FINLAND

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Win 7/8.1/10 (64Bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz dual core processor or higher.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 560 GTX or Radeon R7 260x series or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 (64Bit)
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz multi core processor or higher.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 760 GTX or Radeon R9 280X series or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
